targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", container!="filter", container!="", image!=""}) by (container)

panels.description: db0 = ActionCache, db1 = CAS, db2 = BEP
panels.title: Items in Redis by DB

panels.description: Link to Node Exporter full dashboard for nodes that are hosting workers in this claim.

targets.expr: count by (node) (node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"worker.*", pod!~"worker-provisioner.*"}) * on (node) group_left(instance) label_replace(node_uname_info, "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)")

panels.title: Worker Nodes

panels.description: Abnormal infrastructure events related to your deployment in NativeLink cloud.
panels.title: Infrastructure Events
